value.title: Long-term backup retention (LTR) for Azure SQL Managed Instance in public preview
value.excerpt: Configure long-term backup retention for SQL Managed Instance databases and retain database backups beyond the 35 days provided by Azure SQL Managed Instance automated backups, for up to 10 years.

value.title: Our commitment to expand Azure Availability Zones to more regions
value.excerpt: The cloud continues to play a critical role in our everyday lives. Our customers range from classrooms and small businesses to critical life and safety services and Fortune 500 companies.

value.title: Azure SQL auditing to Log Analytics and Event Hub are now generally available
value.excerpt: Auditing for Azure SQL Database and Azure Synapse Analytics to Log Analytics and Event Hub are now generally available, allowing the centralization of SQL audit logs into a single go-to-location.

value.title: Role-based access control (RBAC) with Azure Active Directory (AAD) on Azure Cosmos DB in public preview
value.excerpt: Benefit from finer grained access control to data and leverage AAD authentication with role-based access control (RBAC) with Azure Active Directory (AAD) for Azure Cosmos DB, now in preview.

value.title: Advance notifications for Azure SQL Database now in public preview
value.excerpt: Prepare for planned maintenance events on your Azure SQL Database resources and minimize the impact of database failovers on your sensitive workloads with advance notifications (preview).

value.title: Apache Spark Connector for SQL Server and Azure SQL now compatible with Spark 3.0
value.excerpt: We are announcing that the preview release of the Apache Spark 3.0 compatible Apache Spark Connector for SQL Server and Azure SQL, available through Maven.

value.title: Icertis boosts performance over 80 percent and lowers costs on Azure SQL
value.excerpt: As customers grow their mission critical workloads, scaling up to manage spiky workloads in house can become an expensive proposition.

value.title: Azure Event Grid is now in public preview for Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Azure Cache for Redis integration with Azure Event Grid is in public preview. This integration allows service manage routing of Redis events like patching, scaling, and import/export(RDB) to any destination.

value.title: Azure Cosmos DB Management with PowerShell cmdlets is now generally available
value.excerpt: Manage Azure Cosmos DB resources using PowerShell cmdlets in the Az.CosmosDB Powershell module—providing full support for all features in general availability for Azure Cosmos DB and across all API’s.

value.title: Azure SQL Database named among the top 3 databases of 2020
value.excerpt: We are excited to share that Azure SQL Database is among the most popular databases of 2020 according to DB-Engines, who recently announced their DBMS of the Year award.

value.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Single Server: logical decoding feature is now generally available
value.excerpt: With logical decoding and wal2json support, unlock change data capture scenarios with Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Single Server.

value.title: Stop/start functionality for Azure Database for MariaDB is now in public preview
value.excerpt: The stop/start feature can enable cost savings on your database servers as you can stop your Database for MariaDB server when not in use and start the server when you resume activity--paying only for what you use.

value.title: Machine Learning on Azure SQL Managed Instance now available
value.excerpt: Use machine learning capabilities on a Managed Instance of Azure SQL Database for ease of moving your data, packages, and models to a cloud ready environment fully configured for machine learning.

value.title: Azure Cosmos DB transactional batch support for Java SDK 4.7.0 and above is now available
value.excerpt: This new support satisfies a frequent customer ask for ACID-compliant transactions that succeed or fail altogether.

value.title: Meeting developer needs with powerful new features in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: In May, we announced a groundbreaking partnership with Redis Labs to bring their Redis Enterprise software to Azure as a part of Azure Cache for Redis. We were humbled by the level of excitement and interest we received. We are announcing that you can now use Redis to tackle new challenges while making

value.title: Register Your Azure SQL Virtual Machines with SQL Server IaaS Agent extension today
value.excerpt: By simply checking a box, you can automatically register all existing and future SQL Server VMs in your subscription to access features designed to enable cost savings and increase manageability.

value.title: Azure Cost Management and Billing updates – October 2020
value.excerpt: Last month, we shared a lot of cost optimization tips and tricks. Continuing with that focus, October is all about helping you save money on Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS), database, or storage offerings. You'll also read about creating subscriptions via Azure Resource Manager deployment templates,

value.title: T-digest extension for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Hyperscale (Citus)
value.excerpt: Now in general availability, the algorithm used in the open source t-digest extension allows high performance percentile calculations on sizable distributed analytical workloads with improved accuracy.

value.title: Distributed database transactions spanning multiple Azure SQL Managed Instances
value.excerpt: Utilize distributed transactions (now in preview) and save time when migrating existing applications that require this capability as it eliminates the need to change application code and to perform extensive testing.

value.title: Zone redundant configuration for Azure SQL DB general purpose tier
value.excerpt: Make your general purpose databases and elastic pools resilient to a much larger set of failures, including catastrophic datacenter outages, without any changes of the application logic by selecting zone redundancy.

value.title: Azure Synapse Link for Azure Cosmos DB: SQL serverless runtime support in preview
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Link now offers preview support for querying Azure Cosmos DB data with Synapse SQL serverless.

value.title: Compete. Learn. Win. Sign up for the Azure SQL Championship Today
value.excerpt: The last six months have seen an unprecedented acceleration in digital transformation. There has never been a more important time for DBAs and developers to prepare for an increasingly cloud-centric future. However, we’d like to make this interesting and fun.

value.title: Reserved capacity on Azure SQL Database Hyperscale is now available
value.excerpt: Obtain discounts on Azure SQL Database Hyperscale using reserved capacity.

value.title: Spring Data Azure Cosmos DB SDK v3.0.0 release now available
value.excerpt: Now you can use the Spring Data framework with the Azure Cosmos DB Core (SQL) API.

value.title: General availability of Azure Monitor for Key Vault and Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor for Key Vault and Azure Monitor for Azure Cache for Redis provide out of the box insights for these resources using platform telemetry.

value.title: Major performance improvements for Azure SQL Managed Instances
value.excerpt: Enhanced log write throughput and superior data/log IOPS make Azure SQL Managed Instances even more appealing for migration.

value.title: Configurable backup storage redundancy options for Azure SQL Database coming soon
value.excerpt: New Azure SQL Database backup storage options coming soon, including local and zone-redundant storage.

value.title: Azure Synapse Link now supports Azure Cosmos DB API for Mongo DB (Preview)
value.excerpt: Analyze MongoDB data stored in Azure Cosmos DB collections using Azure Synapse Link.

value.title: Serverless offer for Azure Cosmos DB coming soon on all APIs
value.excerpt: A new consumption-based offer that complements the existing range of provisioned throughput options is coming soon.

value.title: Additional Azure SQL Database gateways changes effective October 12, 2020
value.excerpt: Additional SQL Gateways are being added for Azure SQL Database in Germany West Central effective 12 October 2020.
